metadata.title: CVE-2016-6172 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: PowerDNS (aka pdns) Authoritative Server before 4.0.1 allows remote primary DNS servers to cause a denial of service (memory exhaustion and secondary DNS server crash) via a large (1) AXFR or (2) IXFR response.

criterions.comment: pdns package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.1-1').
